bibl.title: Influences from Abroad: The Evidence from Textiles.
bibl.note: 1. Textiles brought by the Romans to Qasr Ibrim. - 2. Influence from Meroe. - 3. Imported textiles in medieval times. - 4. Textiles imported during the Ottoman period. - 5. Conclusion.

bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009)

bibl.seg: Nettie K. Adams, Influences from Abroad: The Evidence from Textiles.

J. van der Vliet & J.L. Hagen (edd.), with the assistance of C.H. van Zoest & L.E. van de Peut, Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009) = Egyptologische Uitgave. 26 (Leuven, 2013) pp. 65-81, 12 figg.
1. Textiles brought by the Romans to Qasr Ibrim. - 2. Influence from Meroe. - 3. Imported textiles in medieval times. - 4. Textiles imported during the Ottoman period. - 5. Conclusion.
